data.name: Zero spring episode 2
data.detailed_description:
It is a sequel to Zero spring episode 1.

It is suitable for such players.
· I would like to enjoy the continuation of the story easily at cheap price.

It is not suitable for such players.
· I want to play JRPG over a long time.
· I want to enjoy raising the LV of the character and collecting items.

First you can choose to display the previous synopsis so you can enjoy it without playing the previous game.
Although the previous work was FPS, it became JRPG to express the story completely from episode 2.
It is rare in JRPG, Japan in the near future is the game stage.
Movement / search is 3D FPS format, but battle with enemies is 2D JRPG format.
When you encounter enemies in the 3D movement screen, it switches to the 2D battle screen.
First you can choose English or Japanese, but the user interface will be in English.

Game Features
· 2DCG, completely original characters (We plan for future trading cards)
· JRPG with a story line
· Easy enjoyable difficulty setting
· Guns and body armors actually used by Japanese Self Defense Force and others instead of sword and magic appeared
· You have to think a little to solve a mystery
· The element of FPS action like the previous game disappeared.

How to operate recommended
Change viewpoint with mouse
Walking by W
Decided by space key
Menu screen and cancellation with control key

Method of operation
F4: Easy Full screen.
Mouse: Change viewpoint.
A,Q,W,E,D,Arrow keys: Move player,Function of select
Enter,Space,Ctrl: Function of Enter key
Ctrl: Function of ESC key in Menu panel and battle screen
ESC:Menu panel,Cancel

The leading character Aizawa who finished the hospital investigation in the previous
game will start a new investigation in order to clarify the mystery of the spring water.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/951070/Zero_spring_episode_1_Japanese_version/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/951010/Zero_spring_episode_1_English_translation_version/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1000900/Zero_spring_episode_3/

data.short_description: It is a sequel to Zero spring episode 1. First you can choose to display the previous synopsis so you can enjoy it without playing the previous game. Although the previous work was FPS, it became JRPG to express the story completely from episode 2.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit）
  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo or AMD athlon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or Radeon HD 5430 OpenGL 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 123 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit）
  • Processor: Intel core or AMD athlon2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 AMD Radeon HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
